entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 08:21 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 08:21 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:21 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
